notes: formal/abstract noun; plural exists but is rare

example_sentence_english: The will of the people counts.
The wills of the clients change.
We talk about the people's will.

example_sentence_italian: Mi adeguo al volere della maggioranza.
example_sentence_english: I adapt to the will of the majority.

notes: contraction of a + i; rare plural
example_sentence_italian: Ci adattiamo ai voleri dei clienti.
example_sentence_english: We adapt to the clients' wills.
This stems from the common will.

notes: contraction of da + i; rare plural
example_sentence_italian: Le norme derivano dai voleri locali.
example_sentence_english: The rules derive from local wills.
He finds strength in the will.

notes: contraction of in + i; rare plural
example_sentence_italian: Si perdono nei voleri di troppi.
example_sentence_english: They get lost in the wills of too many.

example_sentence_italian: Sto scrivendo un saggio sul volere.
example_sentence_english: I am writing an essay about the will.

notes: contraction of su + i; rare plural

example_sentence_english: With everyone's will we will succeed.

notes: contraction of con + i; rare plural
example_sentence_english: With opposing wills it is difficult.
